mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO USER_TB(ID, PASSWORD, TYPE_NUMBER, CREATED_AT) VALUES(#{ID},#{PASSWORD},#{TYPE_NUMBER},#{CREATED_AT})
INSERT INTO COMPANY_INFO_TB(ID, CNAME, COM_LOGO,CNUMBER,CREPRESENTIVE, ADDRESS,MANAGER,CSIZE,CYEAR) VALUES(#{ID}, #{CNAME}, #{COM_LOGO}, #{CNUMBER}, #{CREPRESENTIVE}, #{ADDRESS}, #{MANAGER}, #{CSIZE}, #{CYEAR})
